20110122001014.000|20110122001016.000|TR0|them identified as Republicans and so 
20110122001016.000|20110122001018.000|TR0|they're not on the Democratic side. The 
20110122001018.000|20110122001020.000|TR0|problem here is you talk about messaging 
20110122001020.000|20110122001023.000|TR0|because if you're the Republican Party and
